producers.name: Beck, A. T., Steer, R. A., Brown, G. K.

study_info.abstract: The BDI-II is a 21-item self-report instrument designed to measure severity of depressive symptoms in adolescents and adults. Items assess cognitive, affective, and physical symptoms associated with depression. Each item has four response options representing varying degrees of symptom intensity. Widely used in clinical and research settings.

instrument_details.measurement_target: Depression severity in adolescents and adults
instrument_details.response_scale: 4-point scale (0-3 per item with increasing severity)

psychometric_properties.validity: Excellent concurrent validity with clinical diagnoses
